mapper.insert: insert into user_table (id, password, role,nickname, birth, phone) values (#{id},#{password},#{role},#{nickname},#{birth},#{phone})
mapper.select: select * from user_table order by 1 desc LIMIT #{page},#{size}
mapper.update: update user_table set nickname=#{nickname}, birth=#{birth}, phone=#{phone} where id=#{id}
